name: The Shade Forest
description:
Fabulous, FREE and fun 90's inspired platformer game for Android, iOS and PC. Help Drag Queen Amanda Sparks to survive the Shade Forest and rescue her friend from the evil hands of the Hypocritics gang!

In Amanda Sparks and the Shade Forest you control a Drag Queen on a mission to save her queendom from the clutches of an evil gang. With the power of her kisses, the fierce Amanda must defeat enemies, save Gogo boys, Drag Queens and collect MONY to become even stronger. All while keeping her hair and makeup intact, if she's ever going to fight her enemies, might as well look nice while doing that.
